Prefix
TEST

Assert helper macros after http://www.electronvector.com/blog/unit-testing-with-asserts

Definition in file test_assert_helper.h.

Macro Definition Documentation

◆ TEST_ASSERT_FAIL_ASSERT

#define TEST_ASSERT_FAIL_ASSERT (   _code_under_test)
Value:
{ \
CEXCEPTION_T e; \
Try { \
_code_under_test; \
TEST_FAIL_MESSAGE("Code under test did not assert"); \
} \
Catch(e) {} \
}

assert whether assert macro has failed

This macro allows to check during unit tests whether our FAS_ASSERT() macro has failed.

Definition at line 71 of file test_assert_helper.h.

◆ TEST_ASSERT_PASS_ASSERT

#define TEST_ASSERT_PASS_ASSERT (   _code_under_test)
Value:
{ \
CEXCEPTION_T e; \
Try { _code_under_test; } \
Catch(e) { TEST_FAIL_MESSAGE("Code under test failed an assertion"); } \
}

assert whether assert macro has passed

This macro allows to check during unit tests whether our FAS_ASSERT() macro has passed. Using this macro is not mandatory. In the case that an assertion fails "unknowingly", the unit test will failed because of an unhandled exception.

Definition at line 89 of file test_assert_helper.h.
